00058 template <typename T>
00059 static void DebugInfo (
00060                        const string& sClassName,
00061                        const string& sFuncName, 
00062                        const string& sDebugType, 
00063                        const T&      tInfo, 
00064                        const string& sFile, 
00065                        const long&   lLine)
00066 {
00067 #ifdef DEBUG_APP_LOG
00068     if ( pDebugLog != 0 )
00069         pDebugLog->WriteLog( sClassName, sFuncName, sDebugType, tInfo, GetAfterLast( sFile, "\\" ), lLine );
00070 #endif
00071 
00072 #ifdef DEBUG_APP_CONSOLE
00073     cout << endl << sDebugType << ": " << tInfo << endl;
00074     cout << sClassName << "::" << sFuncName << " (" << GetAfterLast( sFile, "\\" ) << " line " << lLine << ")" << endl << endl;
00075 #endif
00076 }
